short_summary: RISO for the purchase of Miscellaneous Grocery Products for CSC Housing Units - Period 5
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), is issuing this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the acquisition and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC’s Housing Units located in the province of Quebec, Canada (Region 1: Laval; Region 2 – Ste-Anne-des-Plaines; Region 3 – Cowansville), as detailed in the Solicitation Documents.
full_summary:
*************************************
# Miscellaneous Grocery Products for CSC Housing Units - Period 5

**Tender Description**

The Public Service and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada, is issuing a Request for Standing Offer for miscellaneous grocery products to civic property home residents and staff. The products will be
